    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111989</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Moj dežnik je lahko balon - domače branje</string>
            <string language="en">My umbrella can be a balloon - home reading</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mein Regenschirm kann ein Ballon sein - 
Hauptmesswert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon parapluie peut être un ballon - lecture à 
la maison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meu guarda-chuva pode ser um balão - leitura 
home</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mio ombrello può essere un aerostato - 
lettura domestica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ομπρέλα μου μπορεί να είναι ένα μπαλόνι - βασική 
ανάγνωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi paraguas puede ser un globo - lectura casera</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Z učnimi listi preverjamo poznavanje pravljice, učence spodbujamo k analiziranju vsebine, domišljijskemu pisanju, ustvarjanju ... Liste lahko natisnete v programih Acrobat Reader ali Word. Pripravljeni so za obojestranski tisk.</string>
            <string language="en">Exercises to check reading comprehension of home reading - My umbrella can be a ballon by Ela Peroci.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">domače branje</string>
            <string language="en">home reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ela peroci</string>
            <string language="en">ela peroci</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pravljica</string>
            <string language="en">fairy tale</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übungen, zum des Leseerfassens des 
Hauptmesswertes zu überprüfen - mein Regenschirm kann ein ballon 
durch Ela Peroci sein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices pour contrôler la compréhension de 
lecture de la lecture à la maison - mon parapluie peut être un 
ballon par Ela Peroci.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios para verificar a compreensão da 
leitura da leitura home - meu guarda-chuva pode ser um ballon por Ela 
Peroci.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni per controllare comprensione della 
lettura di lettura domestica - il mio ombrello può essere un ballon 
da Ela Peroci.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις για να ελέγξει την κατανόηση ανάγνωσης της 
βασικής ανάγνωσης - η ομπρέλα μου μπορεί να είναι ballon από 
Ela Peroci.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicios para controlar la comprensión de la 
lectura de la lectura casera - mi paraguas puede ser un ballon de Ela 
Peroci.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauptmesswert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ela peroci</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fairy Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">peroci do ela</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura domestica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">peroci di ela</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
